input.sentences: [female] would not smile no matter what i did .
i let her run around outside to get a smile out of her .
[male] had no problem smiling for the camera .
[male] held down his chair while i took pictures of the kids .
[female] and grandpa spent some time together in the hammock .
output.sentences: The female child wasn't going to smile no matter what.
Then her mood changed to a smile and she decided to run.
Someone showed her a picture that was taken by a camera of a smiling male child.
The pictures of the male kids made grampa smile.
The day ended with time spent on the hammock with grampa.
